title: General
text: For purposes of section38, the energy efficient appliance credit determined under this section for any taxable year is an amount equal to the sum of the credit amounts determined under paragraph (2) for each type of qualified energy efficient appliance produced by the taxpayer during the calendar year ending with or within the taxable year.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of section38, the energy efficient appliance credit determined under this section for any taxable year is an amount equal to the sum of the credit amounts determined under paragraph (2) for each type of qualified energy efficient appliance produced by the taxpayer during the calendar year ending with or within the taxable year.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(a)(1)In General—For  purposes of section38, the energy efficient appliance  credit determined  under this section for any taxable
                     year is an amount equal to  the sum of  the credit amounts determined under paragraph
                     (2) for each type of  qualified energy efficient appliance produced by the taxpayer
                     during the   calendar year ending with or within the taxable year.

title: Amounts
text: The credit amount determined for any type of qualified energy efficient appliance is—the applicable amount determined under subsection(b)with respect to such type, multiplied by—the eligible production for such type.

logical_structure.result: The credit amount determined for any type of qualified energy efficient appliance is—the applicable amount determined under subsection(b)with respect to such type, multiplied by—the eligible production for such type.

title: Production
text: The eligible production in a calendar year with respect to each type of energy efficient appliance is the excess of——the number of appliances of such type which are produced by the taxpayer in the United States during such calendar year, over—the average number of appliances of such type which were produced by the taxpayer (or any predecessor) in the United States during the preceding 2-calendar year period.

logical_structure.result: The eligible production in a calendar year with respect to each type of energy efficient appliance is the excess of——the number of appliances of such type which are produced by the taxpayer in the United States during such calendar year, over—the average number of appliances of such type which were produced by the taxpayer (or any predecessor) in the United States during the preceding 2-calendar year period.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(c)Eligible Production—The eligible  production in a calendar year  with respect to each type of energy efficient
                  appliance is the excess  of—I.R.C. § 45M(c)(1)—the  number of appliances of such type which are produced by the taxpayer in   the
                     United States during such calendar year, overI.R.C. § 45M(c)(2)—the  average number of  appliances of such type which were produced by the  taxpayer
                     (or any predecessor)
                     in the United States during the preceding 2-calendar year period.

title: Of Energy Efficient Appliance
text: For purposes of this section, the types of energy efficient appliances are——dishwashers described in subsection(b)(1),—clothes washers described in subsection(b)(2)—refrigerators described in subsection(b)(3).

logical_structure.result: For purposes of this section, the types of energy efficient appliances are——dishwashers described in subsection(b)(1),—clothes washers described in subsection(b)(2)—refrigerators described in subsection(b)(3).

raw_text: I.R.C. § 45M(d)Types Of Energy Efficient Appliance—For purposes of this section, the types of energy efficient appliances are—I.R.C. § 45M(d)(1)—dishwashers described in subsection(b)(1),I.R.C. § 45M(d)(2)—clothes washers described in subsection(b)(2)I.R.C. § 45M(d)(3)—refrigerators described in subsection(b)(3).

title: Credit Amount Allowed
text: The aggregate amount of credit allowed under subsection(a)with respect to a taxpayer for any taxable year shall not exceed $25,000,000 reduced by the amount of the credit allowed under subsection(a)to the taxpayer (or any predecessor) for all prior taxable years beginning after December 31, 2010.

logical_structure.result: The aggregate amount of credit allowed under subsection(a)with respect to a taxpayer for any taxable year shall not exceed $25,000,000 reduced by the amount of the credit allowed under subsection(a)to the taxpayer (or any predecessor) for all prior taxable years beginning after December 31, 2010.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(e)(1)Aggregate Credit Amount Allowed—The  aggregate amount of credit allowed  under subsection(a)with respect to a  taxpayer for any taxable year shall not  exceed $25,000,000 reduced
                     by the
                     amount of the credit allowed under subsection(a)to the taxpayer (or any
                     predecessor) for all prior taxable years beginning after December 31, 2010.

title: Allowed For Certain Refrigerators And Clothes Washers
text: Refrigerators described in subsection(b)(3)(F)and clothes washers described in subsection(b)(2)(F)shall not be taken into account under paragraph(1).

logical_structure.result: Refrigerators described in subsection(b)(3)(F)and clothes washers described in subsection(b)(2)(F)shall not be taken into account under paragraph(1).

raw_text: I.R.C. § 45M(e)(2)Amount Allowed For Certain Refrigerators And Clothes Washers—Refrigerators described in subsection(b)(3)(F)and clothes washers described in subsection(b)(2)(F)shall not be taken into account under paragraph(1).

title: Based On Gross Receipts
text: The credit allowed under subsection(a)with respect to a taxpayer for the taxable year shall not exceed an amount equal to 4 percent of the average annual gross receipts of the taxpayer for the 3 taxable years preceding the taxable year in which the credit is determined.

logical_structure.result: The credit allowed under subsection(a)with respect to a taxpayer for the taxable year shall not exceed an amount equal to 4 percent of the average annual gross receipts of the taxpayer for the 3 taxable years preceding the taxable year in which the credit is determined.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(e)(3)Limitation Based On Gross Receipts—The  credit allowed under subsection(a)with respect to a taxpayer for the  taxable year shall not exceed an amount  equal
                     to 4 percent of the average  annual gross receipts of the taxpayer for the  3 taxable
                     years preceding  the taxable year in which the credit is determined.

title: Receipts
text: For purposes of this subsection, the rules of paragraphs(2)and(3)of section448(c)shall apply.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of this subsection, the rules of paragraphs(2)and(3)of section448(c)shall apply.

raw_text: I.R.C. § 45M(e)(4)Gross Receipts—For  purposes of this subsection, the rules of paragraphs(2)and(3)of  section448(c)shall apply.

title: Energy Efficient Appliance
text: The term “qualified energy efficient appliance” means——any dishwasher described in subsection(b)(1)(A),—any clothes washer described in subsection(b)(1)(B), and—any refrigerator described in subsection(b)(1)(C).

logical_structure.result: The term “qualified energy efficient appliance” means——any dishwasher described in subsection(b)(1)(A),—any clothes washer described in subsection(b)(1)(B), and—any refrigerator described in subsection(b)(1)(C).

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(1)Qualified Energy Efficient Appliance—The  term “qualified energy  efficient appliance”
                     means—I.R.C. § 45M(f)(1)(A)—any  dishwasher described in subsection(b)(1)(A),I.R.C. § 45M(f)(1)(B)—any  clothes washer described in subsection(b)(1)(B), andI.R.C. § 45M(f)(1)(C)—any   refrigerator described in subsection(b)(1)(C).

title: Consumption Factor
text: The term “water consumption factor” means, with respect to a clothes washer, the quotient of the total weighted per-cycle water consumption divided by the cubic foot (or liter) capacity of the clothes washer.

logical_structure.result: The term “water consumption factor” means, with respect to a clothes washer, the quotient of the total weighted per-cycle water consumption divided by the cubic foot (or liter) capacity of the clothes washer.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(10)Water Consumption Factor—The term “water consumption factor” means, with respect to a clothes washer, the quotient
                     of the total weighted per-cycle water consumption divided by the cubic foot (or liter)
                     capacity of the clothes washer.

text: The term “dishwasher” means a residential dishwasher subject to the energy conservation standards established by the Department of Energy.

logical_structure.result: The term “dishwasher” means a residential dishwasher subject to the energy conservation standards established by the Department of Energy.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(2)Dishwasher—The  term “dishwasher” means a residential dishwasher subject  to the energy  conservation
                     standards established by the Department of Energy.

requirements: a residential dishwasher subject to the energy conservation standards established by the Department of Energy.

title: Washer
text: The term “clothes washer” means a residential model clothes washer, including a commercial residential style coin operated washer.

logical_structure.result: The term “clothes washer” means a residential model clothes washer, including a commercial residential style coin operated washer.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(3)Clothes Washer—The  term “clothes washer” means a residential model  clothes washer, including  a
                     commercial residential style coin operated washer.

requirements: a residential model clothes washer, including a commercial residential style coin operated washer.

title: Clothes Washer
text: The term “top-loading clothes washer” means a clothes washer which has the clothes container compartment access located on the top of the machine and which operates on a vertical axis.

logical_structure.result: The term “top-loading clothes washer” means a clothes washer which has the clothes container compartment access located on the top of the machine and which operates on a vertical axis.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(4)Top-Loading Clothes Washer—The  term “top-loading clothes washer” means a clothes washer which has the clothes
                     container compartment access located on the top of the machine and which operates
                     on a vertical axis.

requirements: a clothes washer which has the clothes container compartment access located on the top of the machine and which operates on a vertical axis.

text: The term “refrigerator” means a residential model automatic defrost refrigerator-freezer which has an internal volume of at least 16.5 cubic feet.

logical_structure.result: The term “refrigerator” means a residential model automatic defrost refrigerator-freezer which has an internal volume of at least 16.5 cubic feet.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(5)Refrigerator—The  term “refrigerator” means a residential model  automatic defrost  refrigerator-freezer
                     which has an internal volume of at least  16.5 cubic  feet.

requirements: a residential model automatic defrost refrigerator-freezer which has an internal volume of at least 16.5 cubic feet.

title: Energy Factor
text: The term “modified energy factor” means the modified energy factor established by the Department of Energy for compliance with the Federal energy conservation standard.

logical_structure.result: The term “modified energy factor” means the modified energy factor established by the Department of Energy for compliance with the Federal energy conservation standard.

                     the Department of Energy for compliance with the Federal energy conservation standard.

requirements: the modified energy factor established by the Department of Energy for compliance with the Federal energy conservation standard.

text: The term “produced” includes manufactured.

logical_structure.result: The term “produced” includes manufactured.

raw_text: I.R.C. § 45M(f)(7)Produced—The  term “produced” includes manufactured.

title: Energy Conservation Standard
text: The term “2001 energy conservation standard” means the energy conservation standards promulgated by the Department of Energy and effective July 1, 2001.

logical_structure.result: The term “2001 energy conservation standard” means the energy conservation standards promulgated by the Department of Energy and effective July 1, 2001.

                     means the energy conservation  standards promulgated by the Department

requirements: the energy conservation standards promulgated by the Department of Energy and effective July 1, 2001.

title: Per Cycle
text: The term “gallons per cycle” means, with respect to a dishwasher, the amount of water, expressed in gallons, required to complete a normal cycle of a dishwasher.

logical_structure.result: The term “gallons per cycle” means, with respect to a dishwasher, the amount of water, expressed in gallons, required to complete a normal cycle of a dishwasher.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45M(f)(9)Gallons Per Cycle—The term “gallons per cycle” means, with respect to a dishwasher, the amount of water,
                     expressed in gallons, required to complete a normal cycle of a dishwasher.

title: General
text: Rules similar to the rules of subsections(c),(d), and(e)of section52shall apply.

logical_structure.result: Rules similar to the rules of subsections(c),(d), and(e)of section52shall apply.

raw_text: I.R.C. § 45M(g)(1)In General—Rules  similar to the rules of subsections(c),(d), and(e)of section52shall  apply.

title: General
text: All persons treated as a single employer under subsection(a)or(b)of section52or subsection(m)or(o)of section414shall be treated as a single producer.

logical_structure.result: All persons treated as a single employer under subsection(a)or(b)of section52or subsection(m)or(o)of section414shall be treated as a single producer.

title: Of Foreign Corporations
text: For purposes of subparagraph(A), in applying subsections(a)and(b)of section52to this section, section1563shall be applied without regard to subsection(b)(2)(C)thereof.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of subparagraph(A), in applying subsections(a)and(b)of section52to this section, section1563shall be applied without regard to subsection(b)(2)(C)thereof.

text: No amount shall be allowed as a credit under subsection(a)with respect to which the taxpayer has not submitted such information or certification as the Secretary, in consultation with the Secretary of Energy, determines necessary.
